description: This file defines a React component named LobbyModal that provides a modal UI for managing multiplayer lobby players, including adding/removing players and starting the game. It uses React hooks and JSX for rendering.

methods.name: LobbyModal({ open, onClose, players, addPlayer, removePlayer, canStart, onStart })
methods.description: React functional component for the multiplayer lobby modal dialog, allowing user interaction for player management and game start.
